title: Rule Your Atmosphere | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Rule Your Atmosphere | Joel Osteen
description:
If you want to live a life of victory, you have to be careful what you allow into your atmosphere. When you choose to stay in faith, God will fight your battles for you.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
